title: Dancers
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Large, circular, with scene of three figures--man playing accordion, man and woman dancing--in pastoral setting. Glazes predominantly green, red, yellow, separated by cloisonne-like ridges
name: Plate
